name: synthigme-web
description: Prototype EMS Synthi interface in WebAudio

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --message "release: Synthi GME v%s"
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --message "release: Synthi GME v%s"
scripts.release:major: npm version major --message "release: Synthi GME v%s"
scripts.postversion:
printf '
Recuerda ejecutar git push origin main && git push origin --tags
'
